hero.title: About LearnHub
hero.subtitle: Empowering learners worldwide with quality education

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content1: At LearnHub, we believe that education should be accessible to everyone, everywhere. Our mission is to provide high-quality, affordable online courses that help people achieve their personal and professional goals.
mission.content2: We partner with the world's best instructors and institutions to bring you courses that are engaging, practical, and designed to help you succeed in today's fast-paced world.

quality.title: Quality Education
quality.description: We maintain the highest standards in course content and instruction

accessibility.title: Accessibility
accessibility.description: Learning should be available to everyone, regardless of location or background

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We continuously improve our platform and learning methods

community.title: Community
community.description: We foster a supportive environment for learners and instructors

ceo.name: Sarah Johnson
ceo.bio: Former educator with 15 years of experience in online learning

cto.name: Michael Chen
cto.bio: Tech visionary with expertise in EdTech and platform development

cmo.name: Emily Rodriguez
cmo.bio: Marketing expert passionate about making education accessible

coo.name: David Kim
coo.bio: Operations leader dedicated to delivering exceptional learning experiences

cta.title: Join Our Learning Community

hero.title: Get in Touch
hero.subtitle: Have questions? We'd love to hear from you. Send us a message and we'll respond as soon as possible.

form.title: Send Us a Message
form.subtitle: Fill out the form below and our team will get back to you within 24 hours
form.name: Full Name
form.subject: Subject
form.messagePlaceholder: Tell us more about your inquiry...
form.messageMinLength: Message must be at least 10 characters
form.successMessage: Thank you! Your message has been sent successfully. We'll get back to you soon.

q1.question: How long does it take to get a response?
q1.answer: We typically respond to all inquiries within 24 hours during business days. For urgent matters, please call us directly.

q2.question: Can I schedule a call with your team?
q2.answer: Yes! Please mention in your message that you'd like to schedule a call, and we'll send you available time slots.

q3.question: Do you offer technical support?
q3.answer: Absolutely! Our technical support team is available to help you with any platform-related issues. Please provide details about your problem in the message form.
